rukus.text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Idha Nudi Lilssalaati Min Yawmi Al-Jumu`ati Fas`aw 'Ila Dhikri Allahi Wa Dharu Al-Bay`a Dhalikum Khayrun Lakum 'In Kuntum Ta`lamuna
Fa'idha Quđiyati As-Salaatu Fantashiru Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Abtaghu Min Fađli Allahi Wa Adhkuru Allaha Kathiraan La`allakum Tuflihuna
Wa 'Idha Ra'aw Tijaratan 'Aw Lahwan Anfađđu 'Ilayha Wa Tarakuka Qa'imaan Qul Ma `Inda Allahi Khayrun Mina Al-Lahwi Wa Mina At-Tijarati Wa Allahu Khayru Ar-Raziqina
